content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) LONDON  November 02 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Orange S.A.'s Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) and senior unsecured rating at 'BBB+'. Orange's rating is underpinned by the telecom group's strong domestic position in France  which represented 59% of the group's adjusted EBITDA minus capex at end-2016. content: March 31 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Tuesday:

title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: BRUSSELS  March 19 European Union antitrust regulators have suspended their investigation into French telecoms operator Orange's 3.4-billion-euro ($3.64 billion) bid for Spanish peer Jazztel because the firms failed to provide some data on the deal.
name: Orange
title: EU regulators halt Orange  Jazztel probe  await data from firms

content: PARIS France's Orange will plow 15 billion euros ($15.9 billion) into upgrading networks until 2018 to differentiate itself from rivals in a price war in its domestic market.
name: Orange
title: Orange to boost network investments to fuel recovery by 2018

content: PARIS  March 17 France's Orange will plough 15 billion euros ($15.9 billion) into upgrading networks until 2018 to differentiate itself from rivals in a price war in its domestic market.
name: Orange
title: UPDATE 1-Orange to boost network investments to fuel recovery by 2018

title: UPDATE 2-Cameroon renews MTN mobile licence for 15 years  approves 3G and 4G

content: BRUSSELS  March 10 French telecoms group Orange  has offered concessions to European Union antitrust regulators in an attempt to ease competition concerns about its 3.4-billion-euro ($3.66 billion) deal to buy Spanish operator Jazztel.
name: Orange
title: Orange offers competition regulators concessions on Jazztel deal

content: BARCELONA  March 4 French telecoms group Orange  wants to remain in Belgium where it has a 51 percent stake in Mobistar MSTAR.BR>  the country's second biggest mobile operator  and has not been  contacted about a potential bid for Mobistar's smaller rival Base  a top executive said on Wednesday.
name: Orange
title: UPDATE 1-Orange says will remain in Belgium as consolidation brews

content: * Telecom Italia shares up 1.7 pct  Orange flat   (Adds more source  Deutsche Telekom comments  updates shares)
name: Orange
title: UPDATE 3-Telecom Italia shares hit four-year high on Orange interest

content: BARCELONA Telecom Italia shares rose as much as 3 percent on Monday after Orange boss Stephane Richard said a combination with the Italian company would be attractive.
name: Orange
title: Telecom Italia shares climb on Orange deal interest

content: LONDON  March 2 Europe's top European indexes made fresh multi-year highs on Monday as a boost from merger activity in the telecoms sector more than offset falls in media group Vivendi.
name: Orange
title: Telecoms M&A helps European shares to fresh 7-year highs

content: * Signs an agreement with Orange to acquire Orange's digital advertising networks in Spain  in the United States and in Mexico
name: Orange
title: BRIEF-Hi Media to acquire Orange's digital advertising networks in Spain  U.S.  and Mexico

content: MILAN  March 2 Shares in Telecom Italia  rose in early trading on Monday after the chief executive of France's Orange said the two companies had been discussing a possible alliance.
name: Orange
title: Shares in Telecom Italia up after Orange signals interest

content: LONDON  March 2 European shares were seen kicking off March on a flat note on Monday  with many regional benchmarks hovering at multi-year highs after the best start to the year since they started trading in late 1986.
name: Orange
title: European Factors to Watch-Indexes to make flat start to March

title: MIDEAST STOCKS-Gulf markets consolidate as oil dips; telco deal boosts Egypt

content: PARIS Europe's big telecom firms are back to rude financial health after years of poor results and regulatory pressure  drawing crowds of new investors and protests from rivals who worry the formerly state-owned companies may rebuild their monopolies.
name: Orange
title: Europe's big telecoms roar back to health  worrying rivals

content: DUBAI  Feb 23 Telecommunications stocks boosted Egypt's equity market on Monday after French operator Orange said it would increase its stake in local firm Mobinil  while two major phone operators in Saudi Arabia fell as the regulator cut the fees they can charge.
name: Orange
title: UPDATE 2-MIDEAST STOCKS-Telecoms boost Egypt  drag down Saudi Arabia

content: * Buys out Orascom Telecom Media and Technology (OTMT) participation and rights in the Egyptian Company for Mobile Services Mobinil (ECMS)
name: Orange
title: BRIEF-Orange buys out OTMT's participation and rights in ECMS for EUR 209.6 mln

content: PARIS  Feb 17 Telecoms operator Orange  predicted its operating profit would slip this year  as tough competition persists in its key home market of France  but pledged to hold the line on costs to be able to deliver a stable dividend.
name: Orange
title: UPDATE 2-Orange pledges to tame costs to keep 2015 dividend stable

content: PARIS  Feb 17 France's biggest telecom operator Orange posted in-line revenue and operating profit for last year as continued cost-cutting helped it maintain profitability despite sales shrinking across its major markets amid tough competition.
name: Orange
title: Orange pledges to hold 2015 dividend stable after in-line results

content: Feb 4 French telecoms group Orange has explored purchasing some assets in Africa including ones owned by India's top mobile phone carrier Bharti Airtel  as the company seeks to strengthen its business in Africa  Bloomberg reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Orange
title: Orange eyes Bharti's African assets to create "Orange Africa" -Bloomberg

content: LONDON BT  has reached agreement with Orange  and Deutsche Telekom ‎ to buy their UK mobile network operator EE and a deal could be announced as early as Thursday morning  a person familiar with the situation said.
name: Orange
title: BT finalizes deal to buy EE: source

content: LONDON  Feb 4 BT has reached agreement with Orange and Deutsche Telekom  to buy their UK mobile network operator EE and a deal could be announced as early as Thursday morning  a person familiar with the situation said.
name: Orange
title: UPDATE 1-BT finalises deal to buy EE  -source

content: BRUSSELS  Jan 27 Mobile operators such as Vodafone and Orange would be allowed to continue levying roaming charges over the next three years  according to an EU document  defying European lawmakers' proposal to scrap the fees by the end of this year.
name: Orange
title: Mobile roaming fees should remain until 2018 - EU document

content: BRUSSELS European Union antitrust regulators have resumed their scrutiny of Orange's bid for Spanish peer Jazztel after the French telecoms operator provided details of the 3.4-billion-euro ($3.95 billion) deal as requested.
name: Orange
title: EU regulators resume Orange  Jazztel 3.4 billion euro merger scrutiny

content: BRUSSELS  Jan 20 European Union antitrust regulators have resumed their scrutiny of Orange's bid for Spanish peer Jazztel after the French telecoms operator provided details of the 3.4-billion-euro ($3.95 billion) deal as requested.
name: Orange
title: EU regulators resume Orange  Jazztel 3.4 bln euro merger scrutiny

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) LONDON  January 08 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Orange S.A.'s Long-term  Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB+' with Negative Outlook. A full list of  rating actions is below. Orange continues to face a number of challenges in its domestic market  some  international operations and the Enterprise business. These have been driven by  intense competition  tariff rebalancing  regulation  the macro-economic backdrop  and increased inve
name: Orange
title: Fitch Affirms Orange at 'BBB+'; Outlook Negative

content: PARIS  Jan 13 French telecoms group Orange hopes to close a deal to sell its stake in UK mobile operator EE to British telecoms group BT quite soon and will look at further consolidation of the French telecoms market along with other opportunities once the deal is done  its boss said on Tuesday.
name: Orange
title: Orange looks again to French telco consolidation after EE sale
